answers.answer: Sounds like Diabetes to me.  Those are all the symptoms. You can always get a meter from any pharmacy and check it yourself.Ron
ask your doc for an A1c test, this averages out your blood sugar for the last months and will indicate if you have diabetes

question: I have just started my 13th weesk of treatment and i am having some issues. I have to go to the bathroom every 20 mins all day and nite long, i am so thirsty, and in the last month have lost 13lbs. my glucose levels at my last lab were just barly elevated, i am worried because i think it sounds like diabetes whick is a side effect of treatment for some people if i am correct. I am having my 3 month lab on monday should i ask for my sugar levels checked by the brick of my finger monday, or has anybody else gotten these side effects? Also i am bruseing alot easier and there the dark ones, i am worried can somebody help me.     Effie
title: Bathroom trips every 20 mins
